name: linkedin-sequence-generator
description: Full-stack LinkedIn prospect messaging sequence generator

scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
